com.epam.mrymbayev.entity

Class AbstractComposite<E extends Component>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.mrymbayev.entity.AbstractComposite<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Generic - element
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Composite<E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Number, Paragraph, PMark, Sentence, Text, UnknownToken, Word

    public class AbstractComposite<E extends Component>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Composite<E>
    Abstract composite class, parent class for Word, PMark, Number, Sentence, Paragraph, Text classes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rymbayev Meirzhan
    See Also:
    Composite
